author: ydshieh
message:
More precise comment (#36935)

* fix

files.patch:
@@ -22,4 +22,4 @@ jobs:
         run: |
           echo $PR_NUMBER
           gh pr ready $PR_NUMBER --repo $REPO --undo
-          gh pr comment $PR_NUMBER --repo $REPO --body "Hi ðŸ‘‹, thank you for opening this pull request! The pull request is converted to draft by default. When it is ready for review, please click the \`Ready for review\` button (at the bottom of the PR page)."
+          gh pr comment $PR_NUMBER --repo $REPO --body "Hi ðŸ‘‹, thank you for opening this pull request! The pull request is converted to draft by default. The CI will be paused while the PR is in draft mode. When it is ready for review, please click the \`Ready for review\` button (at the bottom of the PR page). This will assign reviewers."
